intro: I provide expert web and mobile application solutions using ExtJS and Sencha Touch technologies.  Having worked on web applications for the past 10+ years, and with Sencha technologies for more than 5 years, I can offer fast, high-quality consulting expertise for new and existing web and mobile applications.
availability: Remote or local to Charlotte, NC
summary: Please browse this site to learn more, and feel free to contact me using the navigation above for more info.
